posts.name: Rishi
posts.cooked:
Question 1 states that we need to find the distance between the given eateries in meters using the Haversine formula. However, in the subsequent questions, it is not explicitly mentioned which formula to use to find the distance between eateries. I tried finding answers using both formulas, and both are providing answers for which options are available. This is the reason why clarification is needed for these questions.

@s.anand

posts.name: Rajat Shenoi
posts.cooked: I am getting the correct answers using haversine. If you’re getting answers that are slightly off, you might be forgetting to exclude the same eatery pair. I had done that mistake. For Q2 I got the correct answer, but for Q3 my answer is off by 1.

posts.name: Anupam Chandra
posts.cooked: Hello @s.anand. Will it be possible for the course team to release the scripts used for the graded assignments so that we can figure out the right way to solve the GA questions?

posts.name: Carlton D'Silva
posts.cooked:
Official Announcement: Answer Scripts for the GAs Tools in Data Science
Dear students, As all the course content has been completed, we have released the answer scripts for the GAs. Please feel free to learn from them. The author of the entire repository is Anand sir. So its a marvelous opportunity to learn from the master. All the code is what he has written for this course. The python files are the answer scripts. And the the javascript files are the question generating scripts. Enjoy!

Please refer to this official post. Hopefully you will find it useful. Thanks.

Kind regards
